title: 01-05-1938_ger_letter-002 - 2025-09-25
original_text:
haci lady!
+
Alles Gute wünsche ich mich
zu kuerer Reise. Ich danke
dir sehr für alles. Leider wollten
es die verschiedenstenx Auter
nicht, dass wir uns von deiner
poreise sehen. Nicht desso
weniger werde ich versüchen
bei euch früchtbringe
Arbeit zu leisten.
7. Uler abend.
Euer Bob.
unde
Solben habe ich die Bewilligung für Flux karte
bekommen. rs
ich Peats have, haugh & Art davon ab wavel
ich Peatz have. Also mich Pemptens komme ich
bestimund. Quer Rob.
S. 1.38
Zabūs, undlish kam gestern Abend Dein
Brief. For kann allerdings nicht verstehen
Ich
dass die 10 Tape keine Post bekommen
лотаре
erast. Ausserdem habe ich immer
wenn ich etwas definitives wüsste
sofort geschrieben.
weiter.
=
Kleines, ich werde nicht mehr jammeren
aber wen das so noch stage
geht, bin ich reif für ein Verven -
Sanatorium. Es ist schade, dass so
viel wertvolle Craft verloren geht.
die 3 Tage fahrt Grätten mir über
haupt nichts
ausgemacht.
ich brauche dazu noch 3. Visumma
Ungarn, Iugoslavien, schweiz.
!das Ingosta vische würde gestern Abgelehn
deh unisste in Zeograd Einreichen
und das dauert stage. Du meiner
Aber.

Verzweiflung leabe ich dann noch
einmal das Aussenministerium
Dr. From ist heute
angerüfen.
zurüélhgekommen, hat man mir
uitgeteilt. Ich bin sofort him, habe
unit seinem Vertreter gesprochen,
ernalen telefonische Kirchsprache
und jetzt sitzte ich unten in
jetzt
tinuministerium und weiße
auf den Brief welchen man mir
für die Nationalbank mithiot.
Jall mache also noch einen Versuch
mich der Zewilligung der Flugkarte
gabūs!
abus, em fild vou all deux wirst
du dir erst machen können,
ich dir alles persönlich erzählen
werde. Komplizierter kann es nicht
Ich
و
wenn
mehr sein. Das was die weisst sind
löchstens 10% davon. Ich mache
es
mir
acers perni. die Verven.
version
versagu
Weisst die wie glücklich ich wäre,
wenn ich alles schon linter mir
lätte?!!!
Du kannst überzeugt sein, dass
ich alles tue. Sicher Aabe ich auch
Fehler gemacht, aber wenn man
vorher alles wrissk, -.
persönlich.
Darüber
undl
bei Troc
bei
·From
ist natürlich durch den Brief
das telegram welches ich saculte
meinem heutigen Besuch
gegenstands los geworden.
Kleines, bitte sei nicht mmgeduldig
ich bin es schon genug Seine Zob.
translated_text: Haci lady! + I wish myself all the best for your short trip. Thank you very much for everything. Unfortunately, various outsiders didn't want us to see each other before your trip. Nevertheless, I will try to do some productive work for you. 7th evening. Yours, Bob. And so I got the approval for the Flux card. If I have Peats, haugh & apart from that I will have Peatz. So I'll definitely come with Pempten. By the way, Rob. P. 1.38 Zabūs, andlish your letter arrived yesterday evening. However, I can't understand why the 10 tapes didn't get in the mail. Besides, I always wrote immediately when I knew something definitive. = Little one, I won't moan anymore, but if this continues, I'm ripe for a Verven sanatorium. It's a shame that so much valuable material is being lost. The three-day journey didn't bother me at all. I also need three more visas for Hungary, Yugoslavia and Switzerland. The Ingosta visa was rejected yesterday and I have to submit it to Belgrade and that's taking time. In my desperation I called the Foreign Ministry again. Dr. From called today. I was told that I had come back. I went there straight away, spoke to his representative, had a conversation over the phone and now I'm sitting down in the Foreign Ministry and waiting for the letter they sent me for the National Bank. So I'll give it one more try and get the flight ticket approved! You won't be able to find out in the whole of the two until I tell you everything in person. It couldn't be more complicated. What you know is at most 10% of it. I make it my own. The Verven. version versagu Do you know how happy I would be if I had already put everything in my mind?!!! You can be sure that I'm doing everything. Of course I've made mistakes too, but if you write everything down beforehand, - personally. About that and at Troc at From, of course, the telegram that I sent about my visit today was sent through the letter. Little one, please don't be patient, I'm already tired of it. Bob.
summary:
WHO: The sender of the text is Bob, addressing the recipient as "Haci lady." The recipient is not explicitly named in the text. The sender mentions receiving a letter from someone named Rob P. 1.38 Zabūs.

NATURE: This document appears to be a personal letter or correspondence between Bob and the recipient, discussing various matters related to travel, visas, approvals, and challenges faced during the planning process.

TOPICS: The text covers topics such as the sender's preparations for a trip, obtaining approvals for a Flux card, visa rejections and applications for Hungary, Yugoslavia, and Switzerland, interactions with the Foreign Ministry, and frustrations with delays and missing materials.

CONTEXT: The text mentions specific locations such as Belgrade and references to visa applications and approvals, indicating that the sender is dealing with bureaucratic processes related to travel. Dates are not explicitly mentioned in the text.

RELATIONSHIP: The relationship between the sender, Bob, and the recipient, referred to as "Haci lady," is not explicitly stated in the text. However, the tone of the letter suggests a level of familiarity and possibly a close relationship where the sender is updating the recipient on travel-related challenges and seeking understanding or support.
